text: The Bible de Genève (Bible of Geneva) is a French translation of the Bible, which was published in Geneva in 1562 or 1588. It is a revision of the Bible d'Olivétan.Museeprotestant Schéma Traductions de la Bible The English Bible of 1560 which is called the Geneva Bible is a different translation. ==References== == Other websites == *Genfer Bibel (German) * La Sainte Bible de Genève de 1669 * La Bible de Genève de 1669 Category:Bible versions Category:Geneva
title: Bible de Genève
